name: A Fox's Tail Demo
description: Hi! This is just a short demo/proof of concept and not of a demo of an actual commercial game. I made this game as part of school coursework, I have no intention of making this a full game, sorry :/ Yeah I know, its not a particularly great game, but if you like it then thanks anyways! I guess I'd describe this as action adventure with some bullet hell elements, atleast thats the general concept.
